title: When to take a stand -- and when to let it go
description: Ash Beckham recently found herself in a situation that made her ask: who am I? She felt pulled between two roles — as an aunt and as an advocate. Each of us feels this struggle sometimes, she says -- and offers bold suggestions for how to stand up for your moral integrity when it isn't convenient.
author: Ash Beckham
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, activism, identity, morality, LGBT
